means: 释放( release的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The commander and some of the men had been released.
sentence.Network_cn: 指挥官和一些士兵已经获释。

sentence.Network_en: Originally released in 1957, the film was remade as "The Magnificent Seven".
sentence.Network_cn: 这部电影最早在1957年上映，后被翻拍为《七侠荡寇志》。

sentence.Network_en: Soldiers took away four people one of whom was later released.
sentence.Network_cn: 士兵们抓走4个人，其中1个随后被放了回来。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Also newly released are clutch shoes made from carbon - reinforced synthetic material., 此外 , 新近公布的是离合器鞋由碳增强合成材料.
Hot Air Balloon Accident 热气球事故-英语点津 ... magical 神奇的 released 出院 tourists 游客.
The prisoner was released early because of good conduct ., 这罪犯因表现良好提前获释.
放飞的英文|放飞是什么意思|Show秀网_专业翻译 ... 放飞 ： fly 放飞 ： released 放飞精彩 ： Fly.

list.abs: 字典中放字的解释 ... (5) 舍弃;废置[ abandon] (7) 解除约束;释放[ free;release] (9) 免去;免除[ exempt from].
Qwrap ...  by:Jerry QuFebruary 28,20130 CommentsTag:qwrap_Release 发布.

entry.def: If a person or animal is released from somewhere where they have been locked up or looked after, they are set free or allowed to go.

example.ex: He was released from custody the next day...
example.tran: 第二天他被从拘留所里放了出来。

example.ex: He is expected to be released from hospital today...

entry.def: When someone is released, you refer to their release .

example.ex: He called for the immediate release of all political prisoners.
example.tran: 他要求立即释放所有政治犯。

example.ex: ...the secret negotiations necessary to secure hostage releases...
example.tran: 为确保人质释放而要进行的秘密谈判

entry.def: If someone or something releases you from a duty, task, or feeling, they free you from it.

example.ex: Divorce releases both the husband and wife from all marital obligations to each other...
example.tran: 离婚解除了夫妻双方相互之间所有的婚姻义务。

example.ex: This releases the teacher to work with individuals who are having extreme difficulty.
example.tran: 这使得教师可以专门辅导学习特别吃力的学生。

entry.tran: 发泄，释放(情感);展示(能力)
entry.def: To release feelings or abilities means to allow them to be expressed.

example.ex: Becoming your own person releases your creativity...
example.tran: 保持自己的本色才有助于发挥自身创造力。

example.ex: I personally don't want to release my anger on anyone else...
example.tran: 我个人并不想把自己的愤怒发泄在别人身上。

entry.def: If someone in authority releases something such as a document or information, they make it available.

example.ex: They're not releasing any more details yet...
example.tran: 他们还未公布更多细节。

example.ex: Figures released yesterday show retail sales were down in March.
example.tran: 昨天公布的数据显示零售额在3月份有所下滑。

entry.def: If you release someone or something, you stop holding them.

example.ex: He stopped and faced her, releasing her wrist.
example.tran: 他停下来面对着她，放开了她的手腕。

example.ex: ...the twisting action before a bowler releases the ball.
example.tran: 投球手掷球前的屈身动作

entry.tran: 打开，放开，松开(制动装置)
entry.def: If you release a device, you move it so that it stops holding something.

example.ex: Wade released the hand brake and pulled away from the curb.
example.tran: 韦德松开手刹驶离路边。

entry.tran: 释放，放出，排放(气体、热量或某种物质)
entry.def: If something releases gas, heat, or a substance, it causes it to leave its container or the substance that it was part of and enter the surrounding atmosphere or area.

example.ex: ...a weapon which releases toxic nerve gas...
The contraction of muscles uses energy and releases heat...
example.tran: 肌肉的收缩消耗能量并且释放热量。

entry.tran: 发行，推出(唱片、碟片或电影)
entry.def: When an entertainer or company releases a new CD, video, or film, it becomes available so that people can buy it or see it.

example.ex: He is releasing an album of love songs.
example.tran: 他即将推出一张情歌专辑。

entry.tran: 新发行的影片;新片;新碟;发行物
entry.def: A new release is a new CD, video, or film that has just become available for people to buy or see.

example.ex: Which of the new releases do you think are really good?
example.tran: 在这些新片中你觉得哪些真的不错？

entry.tran: (影片的)上映，公映；（录像带的）发行
entry.def: If a film or video is on release or on general release, it is available for people to see in public cinemas or for people to buy.

example.ex: The video has sold three million copies in its first three weeks on release.
example.tran: 影碟推出的前3周就卖出了300万张。

means.word_mean: 1. set free as from prison or duty

auth_sentence.content: Much of this material has never been released before.
auth_sentence.res_content: Much of this material has never been released before.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Much of this material has never been released before.

auth_sentence.content: Heck, they hadn't even released a single!
auth_sentence.res_content: Heck, they hadn't even released a single!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Heck, they hadn't even released a single!

auth_sentence.content: The final report is expected be released next year.
auth_sentence.res_content: The final report is expected be released next year.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The final report is expected be released next year.

Sentence.sentence: The company just released an updated version last week, and it'll be utilized in over 50 undergraduate and graduate classrooms this coming school year.
The report, to be released Friday, analyzed data and existing studies of health, disaster, population and economic trends.
It is estimated that 25% of all methane that released into the atmosphere coming from farm animals.
The British industrialist James Louis, held by kidnappers in Central Africa for the past 8 months, was released unharmed yesterday.
